### hasPathOrLoopCrossingSuspendPoint() {#ad7b0b1b552021b1e8f080f4e79253853}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool llvm::SuspendCrossingInfo::hasPathOrLoopCrossingSuspendPoint (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42; From, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42; To) const</>}>
Returns true if there is a path from <code>From</code> to <code>To</code> crossing a suspend point without crossing <code>From</code> a 2nd time.

If <code>From</code> is the same as <code>To</code> this will also check if there is a looping path crossing a suspend point.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/coroutines/suspendcrossinginfo-h/#l00116">116</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/coroutines/suspendcrossinginfo-h">SuspendCrossingInfo.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/coroutines/suspendcrossinginfo-cpp/#l00080">80</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/coroutines/suspendcrossinginfo-cpp">SuspendCrossingInfo.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

## Private Member Functions

### computeBlockData() {#a873b0580c0a3d80167a662f18bcfbd3b}

<MemberDefinition
  template={<>template &lt;bool Initialize = false&gt;</>}
  prototype={<>bool llvm::SuspendCrossingInfo::computeBlockData (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/reversepostordertraversal">ReversePostOrderTraversal</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &#42; &gt; &amp; RPOT)</>}>
Compute the <a href="/docs/api/classes/blockdata">BlockData</a> for the current function in one iteration.

Initialize - Whether this is the first iteration, we can optimize the initial case a little bit by manual loop switch. Returns whether the <a href="/docs/api/classes/blockdata">BlockData</a> changes in this iteration.
